channel.title: New post rank?
channel.description: Tom has been bugging me about making a higher post rank than Senior member, so I'm planning on making one that you get at the 1000 post mark, but I don't know what to call it. Any ideas?

item.title: New post rank?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

And there better not be any QQ about only having 4 stars, or I’m sure less could be arranged

Read full topic

item.title: New post rank?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Coder Eddie, post:223, topic:414348”][quote author=Tico link=topic=516307.msg3750274#msg3750274 date=1315966415]

Batman was one of the original awards, before the pokemon trend even started, back at kaitnieks. iirc at one point the only pokemon award was the pika cup.

Even xerxes had a batman cup!

mjordan will forever be THE batman on this site

True, there are only few individuals who actually have and will obtain it. mjordan is the main one, along with Rich. Taharok and I are to receive it if we ever step down or anything of the sort, but other than that the award is not given out on a regular basis.

After this post, I would expect that all posts are to stay on topic, discussing only the addition of a “new post rank.” Any spam after this post will either be removed or receive further punishment if deemed necessary.
[/quote]

whens the post rank going to happen we need unlimited rep thing…[/quote]

I’ll post about it in the staff section to get it dealt with as soon as possible. We’ll probably go with the one that seems to be liked by people the most. As for unlimited rep, we did have it in the past years, but when certain individuals (cough cough silabsoft cough cough) reached over 1000 points, we really didn’t see a need for anything over 200. Unfortunately rep doesn’t mean as much on this site as it used to be, the only thing that is based on rep is the ability to be voted in as a “MoparScape Vet,” of which 50 rep is required.

Read full topic

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:219, topic:414348”]Definition for post whore:
An Internet forum, or message board, is an online discussion site where people can hold conversations in the form of posted messages. They differ from chat rooms in that messages are not shown in real-time, to see new messages the forum page must be reloaded. …[/quote]
nooo…?
